channel.title: Please i need a lil help
channel.description:
how do i change a weapons attack type? for example, i added a chaotic maul and the attack options where the same as a sword how do i change that so its like a obby maul? im using a delta base 317.
kind regards
The Tormented

item.title: Please i need a lil help
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

no one know how to do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Please i need a lil help
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

yes my server is 317 based, and obveously you dident understand what i was asking for, i know how to change the animations of a model/item i was asking how do i change the interface when you choose your attack type. i only used a chaotic maul for an example because its a cutsom item and it has the attack type of a sword. i was asking how to change that so it says “crush, pummel, block,” so on so forth. i wasent asking how to alter th animations.

kind regards

The Tormented

Read full topic

item.description:

Well is say, going noob style and replacing the obby maul with the c maul, giving it the c mauls bonus’s and giving it the c mauls “picture” anyways…your server is 317 based?

item.title: Please i need a lil help
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

i completly understand where you comming from, and you don’t want to spoon feed people infomation, mabey a hint or a link to another site with the info, and im not going to stop coding, i love it. i can code quite a lot in 317 delta’s now. but you know sometimes things come up and you cant find no anwsers to. i have looked all over morperscape, rune-server and other rsps sites no one is willing to help me.

kind regards

The Tormented

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

i have searched for about 3 hours all in all, can’t no one just give me a awnser? i looked at the interface ids i found warhammer equipt (425), now i have this how do i implement it into my server? do i create a new method in the client.java? help would be appreceated

kind regards

The Tormented
